translations: 精密加工；微织造；微型品制造

sentences.sentence: Also, the precision of machine tools for die machining and microfabrication has improved.
sentences.translation: 此外，为机床模具加工和微细加工精度有所改善。

sentences.sentence: The principle and current application of the femtosecond two-photon microfabrication are introduced.
sentences.translation: 介绍了飞秒激光双光子微细加工技术的原理和应用的现状。

sentences.sentence: Sharp, one of its rivals, recently said that it had developed new microfabrication techniques to build DMFCs with the highest power densities yet achieved.
sentences.translation: 夏普，它的一个竞争对手，最近说已开发出了新的微制造技术，用来制造迄今为止功率密度最高的DMFC。
